mapper.insert: insert into reply (board_id, reply, username, reply_id) values (#{board_id}, #{reply}, #{username}, (select COALESCE(MAX(reply_id), 0) + 1 from reply where board_id=#{board_id})) where board_id=#{board_id}
mapper.select: select reply, username, reply_id, reply_dt from reply where board_id=#{board_id} and deleted_dt is null
